languages.text: "Какой интересный... сборник. Прошу, расскажите нам больше!" {n}Кассия робко подается вперед, и историк, мягко улыбаясь, показывает ей несколько блеклых страниц.{/n}
"What a curious read. Please, tell us more!" {n}As Cassia takes a shy step forward, Gordei smiles and shows her some of the faded pages.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Какой интересный... сборник. Прошу, расскажите нам больше!" {n}Кассия робко подается вперед, и историк, мягко улыбаясь, показывает ей несколько блеклых страниц.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "What a curious read. Please, tell us more!" {n}As Cassia takes a shy step forward, Gordei smiles and shows her some of the faded pages.{/n}
"What a curious read. Please, tell us more!" {n}As Cassia takes a shy step forward, Gordei smiles and shows her some of the faded pages.{/n}
"What a curious read. Please, tell us more!" {n}As Cassia takes a shy step forward, Gordei smiles and shows her some of the faded pages.{/n}
"What a curious read. Please, tell us more!" {n}As Cassia takes a shy step forward, Gordei smiles and shows her some of the faded pages.{/n}
"What a curious read. Please, tell us more!" {n}As Cassia takes a shy step forward, Gordei smiles and shows her some of the faded pages.{/n}
"What a curious read. Please, tell us more!" {n}As Cassia takes a shy step forward, Gordei smiles and shows her some of the faded pages.{/n}

languages.text: 「なんて興味深いお話なのでしょう。もっとお聞かせください！」{n}カシアがおずおずと近寄ると、ゴーディは微笑み、彼女に消えたページを見せる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "What a curious read. Please, tell us more!" {n}As Cassia takes a shy step forward, Gordei smiles and shows her some of the faded pages.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「なんて興味深いお話なのでしょう。もっとお聞かせください！」{n}カシアがおずおずと近寄ると、ゴーディは微笑み、彼女に消えたページを見せる。{/n}

languages.text: « Quel étrange ouvrage. Dites-nous-en plus, je vous prie ! » {n}Cassia fait un pas timide en avant et Gordei sourit en lui montrant quelques-unes des pages jaunies.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What a curious read. Please, tell us more!" {n}As Cassia takes a shy step forward, Gordei smiles and shows her some of the faded pages.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Quel étrange ouvrage. Dites-nous-en plus, je vous prie ! » {n}Cassia fait un pas timide en avant et Gordei sourit en lui montrant quelques-unes des pages jaunies.{/n}

languages.text: “这可真是让人好奇，请和我们多说说吧！”{n}卡西娅害羞地向前迈了一步。戈尔代微笑着，向她展示了褪色的书页。{/n}
languages.original_text: "What a curious read. Please, tell us more!" {n}As Cassia takes a shy step forward, Gordei smiles and shows her some of the faded pages.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这可真是让人好奇，请和我们多说说吧！”{n}卡西娅害羞地向前迈了一步。戈尔代微笑着，向她展示了褪色的书页。{/n}

languages.text: "Was für eine faszinierende Lektüre. Bitte erzählt uns mehr!" {n}Als Cassia schüchtern einen Schritt nach vorne geht, lächelt Gordei und zeigt ihr einige der verblassten Seiten.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What a curious read. Please, tell us more!" {n}As Cassia takes a shy step forward, Gordei smiles and shows her some of the faded pages.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Was für eine faszinierende Lektüre. Bitte erzählt uns mehr!" {n}Als Cassia schüchtern einen Schritt nach vorne geht, lächelt Gordei und zeigt ihr einige der verblassten Seiten.{/n}

languages.text: «Qué lectura tan interesante, ¡muéstrenos más!». {n}Mientras Cassia da un tímido paso adelante, Gordei sonríe y le muestra algunas de las páginas descoloridas.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What a curious read. Please, tell us more!" {n}As Cassia takes a shy step forward, Gordei smiles and shows her some of the faded pages.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Qué lectura tan interesante, ¡muéstrenos más!». {n}Mientras Cassia da un tímido paso adelante, Gordei sonríe y le muestra algunas de las páginas descoloridas.{/n}

languages.text: "Ne ilginç bir kitap. Lütfen anlatmaya devam et!" {n}Cassia çekinerek bir adım öne çıkınca Gordei, gülümseyip ona sararmış sayfaları gösteriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What a curious read. Please, tell us more!" {n}As Cassia takes a shy step forward, Gordei smiles and shows her some of the faded pages.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ne ilginç bir kitap. Lütfen anlatmaya devam et!" {n}Cassia çekinerek bir adım öne çıkınca, Gordei gülümseyip ona sararmış sayfalardan bazılarını gösteriyor.{/n}
